text: The Pheasant Breeding Centre, Berwala (Hindi: तीतर प्रजनन केंद्र, बेरवाला) is a purpose-built centre for the breeding of pheasants situated in Berwala in Panchkula district. ==Description== Several types of pheasants are bred, including red junglefowl (Gallus gallus), endangered cheer pheasant (Catreus wallichii) and endangered kalij pheasant. The centre has a program for breeding and releasing birds into the wild. ==References== Category:Wildlife sanctuaries in Haryana Category:Zoos in Haryana
title: Pheasant Breeding Centre, Berwala
